item.title: Balaklava Travel Guide (Crimea/Southern Russia/Russia/Eastern Europe/Europe)
item.description: Discover the best places to visit, where to stay, what to eat, and how to get around in Balaklava, Crimea's hidden gem in Southern Russia. Find out about the rich cultural and historical attractions, breathtaking natural sights, and exciting outdoor adventures.
